name: Men's Ministry
description: Building strong men of faith who lead their families and serve the community with integrity. We focus on spiritual growth, accountability, and practical leadership in our homes and workplaces.
quote: Be watchful, stand firm in the faith, act like men, be strong. Let all that you do be done in love. (1 Corinthians 16:13â€“14)

name: Women's Ministry
description: Empowering women to grow in grace, fellowship together, and make a difference in God's kingdom. Our ministry provides a space for support, mentorship, and deep spiritual connection.
quote: She is clothed with strength and dignity; she can laugh at the days to come. (Proverbs 31:25)

name: Youth Ministry
description: Inspiring the next generation to encounter God, build authentic relationships, and live out their faith. We are a vibrant community of young believers passionate about Jesus.
meetingHours: Wed 7:00 PM - 8:00 PM and after Sunday services
quote: Don't let anyone look down on you because you are young, but set an example for the believers. (1 Timothy 4:12)

name: Junior Youth Ministry
description: Nurturing pre-teens and young adolescents in their transition from childhood to youth, fostering a strong foundation in Christ and healthy peer relationships.
quote: Remember your Creator in the days of your youth, before the days of trouble come. (Ecclesiastes 12:1)

name: Children's Ministry
description: A fun and safe environment where kids learn about Jesus through Bible stories, songs, and play. We believe in building a strong foundation of faith from a young age.
quote: Let the little children come to me, and do not hinder them. (Mark 10:14)

name: Dorcas Ministry
description: Dedicated to helping the needy in our community and church. We contribute through various charitable acts, providing relief, and showing the practical love of Christ to those in difficult circumstances.
quote: She was always doing good and helping the poor. (Acts 9:36)

name: Choir Ministry
description: Lifting our hearts in praise through choral music. The choir leads the congregation in worship with spiritually uplifting songs and hymns.
quote: Sing to the Lord a new song; sing to the Lord, all the earth. (Psalm 96:1)

name: Praise and Worship Ministry
description: Leading the congregation into the presence of God through contemporary worship music. This ministry focuses on fostering an atmosphere of deep spiritual connection through songs.
quote: God is spirit, and those who worship him must worship in spirit and truth. (John 4:24)

name: Intercessory Ministry
description: Standing in the gap through fervent prayer, interceding for the church, community, and nations. We believe in the power of prayer to bring transformation.
quote: The prayer of a righteous person is powerful and effective. (James 5:16)

name: Development Ministry
description: Overseeing church physical development and projects. This ministry ensures that the church's facilities are well-maintained and coordinates new building projects.
quote: Unless the Lord builds the house, the builders labor in vain. (Psalm 127:1)

name: Ushers Ministry
description: Ensuring a smooth and organized service experience by guiding congregation members and maintaining order in the house of God.
quote: For a day in your courts is better than a thousand elsewhere. I would rather be a doorkeeper in the house of my God than dwell in the tents of wickedness. (Psalm 84:10)

name: Hospitality Ministry
description: Welcoming guests with a warm smile and demonstrating God's love through kindness and service to everyone who walks through our doors.
quote: Do not forget to show hospitality to strangers, for by so doing some have shown hospitality to angels without knowing it. (Hebrews 13:2)

name: Royal Queens
description: A special fellowship of women called to serve with dignity, grace, and spiritual excellence in God's kingdom.
quote: You are a chosen people, a royal priesthood, a holy nation. (1 Peter 2:9)

name: Media Ministry
description: Using technology and creative arts to amplify the Gospel message through video, audio, and digital platforms.
quote: Go into all the world and preach the gospel to all creation. (Mark 16:15)
